title: [WORK] 8: "The Secret To Truly Successful People" w/ Alex Banayan (Bestselling Author)
description: Believe it or not, your career is a lot like a nightclub. There's the front door, where the lines are long and everyone is waiting to get in... There's the back door, where the VIPS go and the line's less intense, and then... There's the THIRD DOOR: the one where the resourceful and creative people go, with minimal lines. Bestselling Author Alex Banayan, author of The Third Door, shares his journey on an unprecedented adventure—from hacking Warren Buffett’s shareholders meeting to chasing Larry King through a grocery store to celebrating in a nightclub with Lady Gaga—as Alex Banayan travels from icon to icon, decoding their success.
